item.title: Class 8 file is only for custom item?
item.dc:creator: @Kono-chan Kono-chan
item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

[quote=“briice14, post:5, topic:377656”]Hey , if you don’t want to reply , don’t do it -,-

I just ask a question to earn time so stfu

Thanks Clawz Fury :)[/quote]

Was already answered twice, didn’t feel the need to answer it a third time. Was asking him why he even bothered posting when the person before him answered it perfectly fine.

TBH Echo_ did answer the question.

Though, since it’s answered I’m not going to sit and argue about it. Glad they could answer your question lol

Read full topic

item.title: Class 8 file is only for custom item?
item.dc:creator: @Kono-chan Kono-chan
item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:3, topic:377656”][quote author=Echo_ link=topic=473548.msg3462675#msg3462675 date=1294604410]
That’ s is probably the only reason you will ever edit anything in class8.java, hardcoding items.
[/quote]

Wtf are you saying LOL? Just answer his question

On Topic: Yes Class8 is only for adding item ints.[/quote]

What was wrong with his answer? The only thing most people use class8 for is hardcoding in new items… All you did was repeat him and add a “yes” to the beginning.

Read full topic
